content: This should be an easy project. The goal is just to create an instance of docs#ContinuousFunctionalCalculus for p := IsSelfAdjoint, and A := Matrix n n ğ•œ where ğ•œ is â„ or â„‚. Mathlib already has all the necessary pieces and they just need to be put together. After this, we could follow-up with the same instance for positive semidefinite matrices.
